imdb.plot outline: Taraji P. Henson is back this holiday season to spread cheer, goodwill and some holiday magic in a music and variety special featuring renditions of classic holiday songs by entertainment superstars, including EMPIRE's Jussie Smollett, Taye Diggs, Pharrell Williams, Missy Elliott, Alicia Keys, Darryl McDaniels of Run-DMC, Snoop Dogg and TLC.
imdb.title: Taraji's White Hot Holidays
plot: Taraji P. Henson is back this holiday season to spread cheer, goodwill and some holiday magic in a music and variety special featuring renditions of classic holiday songs by entertainment superstars, including EMPIRE's Jussie Smollett, Taye Diggs, Pharrell Williams, Missy Elliott, Alicia Keys, Darryl McDaniels of Run-DMC, Snoop Dogg and TLC.
